verses.kjv: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin;
verses.web: Therefore, since Christ suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves also with the same mind; for he who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin,
verses.ct: Since Christ suffered in his body for us, prepare yourselves with that same mindset. Because anyone who has suffered in the body is done with sin.

verses.kjv: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
verses.web: that you no longer should live the rest of your time in the flesh for the lusts of men, but for the will of God.
verses.ct: From now on, don't spend the rest of your lives chasing human desires. Instead, live for the will of God.

verses.kjv: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles, when we walked in lasciviousness, lusts, excess of wine, revellings, banquetings, and abominable idolatries:
verses.web: For we have spent enough of our past time doing the desire of the Gentiles, and having walked in lewdness, lusts, drunken binges, orgies, carousings, and abominable idolatries.
verses.ct: You've already wasted enough of your lives doing what the pagans do — living in sexual immorality, chasing every craving, getting drunk, throwing wild parties, and taking part in disgusting idol worship.

verses.kjv: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot, speaking evil of you:
verses.web: They think it is strange that you don’t run with them into the same excess of riot, blaspheming.
verses.ct: Your old friends think it's bizarre that you won't join them anymore in their reckless, out-of-control lifestyle, so they trash-talk you for it.

verses.kjv: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.
verses.web: They will give account to him who is ready to judge the living and the dead.
verses.ct: But they will have to answer to the one who stands ready to judge both the living and the dead.

verses.kjv: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.
verses.web: For to this end the Good News was preached even to the dead, that they might be judged indeed as men in the flesh, but live as to God in the spirit.
verses.ct: This is why the gospel was preached even to those who have since died — so that even though they were judged in the body as all people are, they might live in the spirit according to God's purpose.

verses.kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
verses.web: But the end of all things is near. Therefore be of sound mind, self-controlled, and sober in prayer.
verses.ct: The end of all things is near. So keep a clear head, stay disciplined, and be devoted to prayer.

verses.kjv: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.web: And above all things be earnest in your love among yourselves, for love covers a multitude of sins.
verses.ct: Above everything else, love each other deeply, because love covers a multitude of sins.

verses.kjv: Use hospitality one to another without grudging.
verses.web: Be hospitable to one another without grumbling.
verses.ct: Open your homes to one another without complaining about it.

verses.kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
verses.web: As each has received a gift, employ it in serving one another, as good managers of the grace of God in its various forms.
verses.ct: Each of you has received a gift from God. Use it to serve one another as faithful stewards of God's grace in all its many forms.

verses.kjv: If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.web: If anyone speaks, let it be as it were the very words of God. If anyone serves, let it be as of the strength which God supplies, that in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom belong the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: If you speak, speak as though delivering the very words of God. If you serve, serve with the strength God provides. Do everything so that God receives glory through Jesus Christ, to whom belong all glory and power forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:
verses.web: Beloved, don’t be astonished at the fiery trial which has come upon you to test you, as though a strange thing happened to you.
verses.ct: Dear friends, don't be shocked when you go through fiery trials, as if something unusual is happening to you. These trials are meant to test you.

verses.kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ’s sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
verses.web: But because you are partakers of Christ’s sufferings, rejoice, that at the revelation of his glory you also may rejoice with exceeding joy.
verses.ct: Instead, be glad that you're sharing in Christ's sufferings, because when his glory is revealed, your joy will be beyond anything you can imagine.

verses.kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.
verses.web: If you are insulted for the name of Christ, you are blessed; because the Spirit of glory and of God rests on you. On their part he is blasphemed, but on your part he is glorified.
verses.ct: If people insult you because of the name of Christ, you are blessed — because the Spirit of glory, the Spirit of God, rests on you. They dishonor him, but you bring him glory.

verses.kjv: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men’s matters.
verses.web: For let none of you suffer as a murderer, or a thief, or an evil doer, or a meddler in other men’s matters.
verses.ct: Make sure that none of you suffers for being a murderer, a thief, a criminal, or a meddler in other people's business.

verses.kjv: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.
verses.web: But if one of you suffers for being a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God in this matter.
verses.ct: But if you suffer for being a Christian, don't be ashamed. Instead, give glory to God for bearing that name.

verses.kjv: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God: and if it first begin at us, what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God?
verses.web: For the time has come for judgment to begin with the household of God. If it begins first with us, what will happen to those who don’t obey the Good News of God?
verses.ct: The time has come for judgment to begin with God's own household. And if it starts with us, what will be the fate of those who refuse to obey the gospel of God?

verses.kjv: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?
verses.web: “If it is hard for the righteous to be saved, what will happen to the ungodly and the sinner?”
verses.ct: If it's hard enough for the righteous to be saved, what will become of the ungodly and the sinner?

verses.kjv: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.
verses.web: Therefore let them also who suffer according to the will of God in doing good entrust their souls to him, as to a faithful Creator.
verses.ct: So if you're suffering because it's God's will, keep doing what is right and trust your soul to your faithful Creator.
